#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType GolfBag.

== Name ==

*[CGolfBag GolfBag]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--GolfBag (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			A golf bag can contain either golf clubs or references to them when they are
			in equipement-list elements.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  (name, [CREF_GolfBag bag-ref]?, ([CREF_GolfClub golf-club-ref] | [CGolfClub golf-club]){1,14} , [CEquipment equipment]`*`  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CREF_GolfBag golfml:REF_GolfBag] || [CREF_GolfBag bag-ref] ||  					Reference to the golf bag used for the round from the pieces of equipement.				 ||
|| [CEquipment golfml:Equipment] || [CEquipment equipment] ||  					Other piece of equipment used in bag: Balls, tees, apparel, gloves...				 ||
|| [CGolfClub golfml:GolfClub] || [CGolfClub golf-club] ||  						Definition of a golf club owned by the player.					 ||
|| [CREF_GolfClub golfml:REF_GolfClub] || [CREF_GolfClub golf-club-ref] ||  						Reference to a golf club in the player's equipment list.					 ||
|| xs:string || name ||  					Name of a golf bag used to identify it.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPlayer Player]
----
    <xs:complexType name="GolfBag">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="bag-ref" type="golfml:REF_GolfBag">    </xs:element>    <xs:choice maxOccurs="14" minOccurs="1">      <xs:element name="golf-club-ref" type="golfml:REF_GolfClub">      </xs:element>      <xs:element name="golf-club" type="golfml:GolfClub">      </xs:element>    </xs:choice>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="equipment" type="golfml:Equipment">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence></xs:complexType>
----
